meaningMnemonic: A <radical>creeper</radical> inside of a <radical>cape</radical>, who are they? They’re the <kanji>director</kanji> of a movie. They try to look all mysterious, but you know it’s just so people go see their movies and think they’re cool. Really they’re just a creep deep down.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>director</kanji> is currently directing a movie about <reading>shee</reading>p (し). He keeps petting them and talking to them like they're humans.
